{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=GT-AX11000 |revision=(ROG Rapture) |series=AX11000 |asin=B07MRD1LDZ |newegg=N82E16833320371 |price=450 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9118B |manuf_rev=AX444-ASU |availability=now |est_release_date=11/15/2018 |fcc_date=02/15/2018 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTHR00 |ic_id=3568A-RTHR00 |pcb_id= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.42 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16ER-EK |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43684 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM84880 |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=2.5GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, VHT160, HE160, DFS, AiMesh, WTFast, TWT, Link Aggregation, AiProtection, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=AsusWRT-Merlin |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_ssid=ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_2G$,,,^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• 2x '''4804''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz 802.11ax (160MHz chan.), :• 1x '''1148''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz 802.11ax (40MHz chan.) = '''''AX11000'' class'''
{{TagLine|ROG Rapture AX11000 Tri-Band WiFi 6 Gaming Router}} :''ROG Rapture GT-AX11000'' :[https://www.asus.com/Gaming-Networking/ROG-Rapture-GT-AX11000/ Product page] *''AX11000 Tri-band WiFi Gaming Router'' :10 Gigabit Wi-Fi router with Quad-Core processor :2.5GbE gaming port, DFS band, WTFast, Adaptive QoS, AiMesh :for Mesh WiFi system and AiProtection network security :2.5Gbps port can reportedly be configured for WAN or LAN. {{See also|ASUS GT-AX6000|ASUS RT-AX95U|Huawei AP7060DN}} *The "1.8GHz Quad-core" specs on the ASUS product page suggests that this device :uses a [[Broadcom]] CPU like the BCM4908 along with three BCM43684 radios. {{SCollapse2|[https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin.ng/blob/master/release/src-rt/target.mak target.mak] • >> |
export GT-AX11000 := $(HND-94908_BASE)
export GT-AX11000 += BUILD_NAME="GT-AX11000" EXT_PHY="BCM84880" SWITCH2="" NVSIZE="128" DHDAP=y DPSTA=y WTFAST=y \
 REPEATER=y ARM=y AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y LACP=y \
 PRINTER=y WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y USB="USB" APP="network" PROXYSTA=y DNSMQ=y SHP=n BCMWL6=y BCMWL6A=y IPV6SUPP=y \
 DISK_MONITOR=y BTN_WIFITOG=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y LED_BTN=n BCMSMP=y XHCI=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y ROG=y HTTPS=y \
 OPENVPN=y TIMEMACHINE=y MDNS=y VPNC=y BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y BWDPI=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=n LINUX_MTD=64 DEBUGFS=y \
 TEMPROOTFS=n SSH=y EMAIL=y FRS_FEEDBACK=n SYSSTATE=y STAINFO=y CLOUDCHECK=n NATNL_AICLOUD=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
 MULTICASTIPTV=y QUAGGA=y WLCLMLOAD=n BCM_MUMIMO=y LAN50="all" ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y CFEZ=y ETLAN_LED=y TFAT=y \
 NTFS=tuxera HFS=tuxera NEWSSID_REV2=y NEW_APP_ARM=y VISUALIZATION=y BONDING=y BONDING_WAN=y NETOOL=y DUALWAN=y \
 TRACEROUTE=y FORCE_AUTO_UPGRADE=n ALEXA=y IFTTT=y SW_HW_AUTH=y HD_SPINDOWN=y ASPMD=n BCM_MEVENT=n BCMEVENTD=n \
 BCM_APPEVENTD=n LETSENCRYPT=y VPN_FUSION=n JFFS_NVRAM=y NVRAM_ENCRYPT=y NATNL_AIHOME=y BTN_TURBO=y LOGO_LED=y \
 BCM_CEVENTD=y UTF8_SSID=y RGBLED=y AURASYNC=y I2CTOOLS=y AMAS=y DBLOG=y ETHOBD=y CONNDIAG=y WIREGUARD=y ASD=y \
 IPSEC=STRONGSWAN IPSEC_SRVCLI_ONLY=SRV DWB=y GAME_PROFILE=y ROG_UI=n AMASDB=n CRASHLOG=y WATCH_REINIT=n BW160M=y \
 BRCM_HOSTAPD=y UUPLUGIN=y IPERF3=y INFO_EXAP=y OPEN_NAT=y AHS=n FRS_LIVE_UPDATE=n CAPTCHA=y SW_CTRL_ALLLED=y \
 GAME_MODE=y CFGSYNC_LOCSYNC=y INSTANT_GUARD=y AMAS_ETHDETECT=y ACL96=y GOOGLE_ASST=y EXTEND_LIMIT=y ASUSCTRL=y \
 IPV6S46=y COMFW=y CALC_NVRAM=y \
 NFS=y SNMPD=n TOR=y UPNPIGD2=n NANO=y NTPD=y
}} ===Models=== *[[ASUS GT-AX11000]] (''ROG Rapture GT-AX11000'') - Wi-Fi 6 *[[ASUS GT-AXE11000]] (''ROG Rapture GT-AXE11000'') - Wi-Fi 6E :{{WiFiCert|WFA111313|03/25/2021}} ===Overview=== *'''Triple-level Game Acceleration''' - Accelerate game traffic :every step of the way - from device to game server. *'''Battle-ready-hardware''' - 1.8GHz quad-core CPU and 2.5GbE :(2.5GBase-T) port for ultimate performance. *'''Front-line Network Security''' - Neutralize internet threats :before they hit your network. *'''Better Partner with Mesh System''' - Compatible with ASUS :AiMesh Wi-Fi system for seamless whole-home coverage. ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-rog-rapture-gt-ax11000-review ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AX11000 review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8948/asus-rog-rapture-ax11000-wi-fi-6-router-review/index.html ''ASUS ROG Rapture AX11000 Wi-Fi 6 Router Review'' on '''Tweaktown'''] *[https://koolshare.cn/thread-149545-1-1.html ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AX11000 Teardown'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (CN) ===News=== *[https://www.asus.com/us/News/rU7DdBAsBXMQ5cn0 ''ASUS Announces a Complete Lineup of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''ASUS'''] :"A new Turbo Key conveniently located on the outside of the chassis allows you to toggle :various functions like Zero Wait DFS on or off without using the web GUI or App interface." *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/12871/asus-announces-a-complete-lineup-of-80211ax-routers ''ASUS Announces a Complete Lineup of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-expands-11ax-lineup-and-sets-ship-date.47010/ ''ASUS Expands 11ax Lineup And Sets Ship Date'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===See also=== :;[https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/WiFi-Routers/All-series/filter?Series=ROG-Republic-of-Gamers ASUS Republic of Gamers] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Wireless-Routers-Products/ ASUS Wireless Routers] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[ASUS GT-AXY16000]] (EU/EEU) - ''ROG Rapture Quad-band WiFi 6 Gaming Router'' • [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-ax-router-coming-gt-axy16000.61035/ SNB] • [https://fccid.io/EEC/RU0000053475 FCC ID] *[[ASUS GT-AX11000]] (EU/EEU) - ''ROG Rapture GT-AX11000 Tri-band WiFi 6 Gaming Router'' • [https://rog.asus.com/networking/rog-rapture-gt-ax11000-model/ PPage] *[[ASUS GT-AXE11000]] - ROG Rapture GT-AXE11000 Tri-band WiFi 6E Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AX6000]] (N/S) - ''ROG Rapture GT-AX6000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router'' • [https://github.com/blackfuel/asuswrt-rt-ac86u/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/model.c GH] *[[ASUS GS-AX5400]] (EU/EEU) - ''ROG Strix GS-AX5400 Dual Band WiFi 6 Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GS-AX3000]] (EU/EEU) - ''ROG Strix GS-AX3000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS TUF-AX5400]] - ''TUF Gaming AX5400 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router'' *[[ASUS TUF-AX3000]] - ''TUF Gaming AX3000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture GT-AC9600 Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture GT-AC5300 Tri-Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC2900]] - ''ROG Rapture GT-AC2900 WiFi Gaming Router'' ---- *[[ASUS RT-AX95U]] - ''AX3000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi 6 Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX1800]] - ''AX1800 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi 6 Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX1800S]] - ''AX1800 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi 6 Router'' __NOTOC__
